alert.note: Alert for Sabine; San Augustine (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 2:31PM CDT until June 12 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Central Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern San Augustine County in eastern Texas... Central Sabine County in eastern Texas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 230 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near San Augustine to 9 miles south of Natchitoches, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milam, Many, San Augustine, Hemphill, Rosevine, Florien, Fisher, Kisatchie, Sexton, Mount Carmel, Bellwood, Bronson, Negreet, Columbus, Chinaquapin and Gorum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
